name: Potion Commotion: Rainbow Edition
description:
This game is a chill game about farming magical plants and making potion with them. The game is quite straight forward. You click on seeds from your inventory and place them on a watered field. Fields can be watered with the Potion of Hydration, which can be made in the cauldron with 5 pieces of a Hydroangea flower. If you're ever confused, simply refer to the game's journal.

This is just the basics. The game has a 'How to play' section on the menu and the game will guide you along the way.

Features
  • Potion Brewing
  • Plant Harvesting
  • Bird Feeding
  • Achievements
  • Story Elements
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Weather Change
  • Statistics (if that's your thing!)
Note

This game a neat little idea that Jas and I had. She made her own version of this game which can be found here.  Please also note that this game is still IN DEVELOPMENT! So, the game might break sometimes. Please leave a comment if that happens, so I can fix it!

Credits

Most assets are made by me but a few of them are made by my girlfriend, Jas.
The music is made by me in FL Studio 20.
The code is all written by me in Game Maker: Studio
